body:
Brilliant.
I wonder what would the mangaka that drew this do if they knew about the current situation in TF2.

Just a friendly reminder, this is a work of fiction intended to get dicks hard and pussies wet. No need to get all hissy about it in the comments. Only retards would take this as anything but what it is at face value, a pornographic comic.
I'm not sure what I should think of this
